name: mona/ultrahuman
description: Access Ultrahuman metrics to monitor sleep, recovery, steps, heart rate, HRV, temperature, glucose, and metabolic score. Get rich sleep summaries with efficiency, HR/HRV quick stats, and stage breakdowns, plus daylong step counts. Track daily trends to guide training, wellness decisions, and personalized coaching.

tools.name: get-user-metrics
tools.title: Get User Metrics
tools.description: Fetch Ultrahuman metrics for the configured user and a specific date. Returns sleep data, movement data, heart rate, HRV, temperature, steps, glucose, metabolic score, and more.

tools.name: get-sleep
tools.title: Get Sleep Data
tools.description: Fetch sleep data for the configured user on a specific date. Returns sleep summary, quick metrics (total sleep, efficiency, heart rate, HRV), and sleep stages breakdown.

include_graphs.description: Whether to include detailed sleep graphs (sleep stages, movements, HR, HRV). Default is false.

tools.name: get-recovery
tools.title: Get Recovery Score
tools.description: Fetch recovery score for the configured user on a specific date.

tools.name: get-steps
tools.title: Get Steps Data
tools.description: Fetch steps data for the configured user on a specific date. Returns step count values throughout the day and average steps.
